#summary A description of the changes between each release.

= Current production release 0.9 alpha =

= Next release 0.9.1a =

  * Change the way for load xml confguration file. Now this is asynchronous , and you receive a callBack event when load configuration is complete.
  * Added global-interceptors
  * Fixed wrong error messages in GuasaxContainer
  * In this release you will be able for divided xml configuration file in several files, with element "<include file="another-file-conf.xml" />


= 0.9a =
  * Initial release
